description: Try our easy to follow Smoked Salmon with Mustard & Dill Dressing recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Smoked Salmon with Mustard & Dill Dressing Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 slices crusty brown bread, sliced (to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Divide the salmon among 4 serving plates, and squeeze over a little lemon juice.

To make the dressing, put the olive oil, vinegar, mustard, and honey in a jug or small bowl. Whisk together until well combined, then season with salt and black pepper. Sprinkle in half of the dill, and whisk again. Taste, and adjust seasoning as needed.
Toss the cucumber along with the remaining dill, then spoon the cucumber and dill onto the plates. When ready to serve, drizzle over the dressing, and serve with the brown bread.
